entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Quispamsis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 1:04 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: NNE 38 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with rain changing to rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
